SELECT EXISTS ( -- 1. 기안자 SELECT 1 FROM approval_document d WHERE d.doc_id = #{docId} AND d.writer_id = #{userId} AND d.is_deleted = 'N'
UNION
-- 2. 결재자 / 대리결재자 SELECT 1 FROM approval_line l JOIN approval_line_step s ON l.line_id = s.line_id WHERE l.doc_id = #{docId} AND s.is_deleted = 'N' AND (s.approver_id = #{userId} OR s.proxy_approver_id = #{userId})
UNION
-- 3. 참조자 SELECT 1 FROM approval_reference r WHERE r.doc_id = #{docId} AND r.reference_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 'N' )
